info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 10 at 2:12AM MST until August 10 at 3:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a
* Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona...
* Until 315 AM MST.
* At 208 AM MST, blowing dust with visibilities as low as one mile and wind gusts of 25 to 35 mph can be found across western Pinal into central Maricopa County located rom Casa Grande to southern portions of Phoenix.
HAZARD...One to two miles visibility.
SOURCE...Doppler radar.
IMPACT...Hazardous travel.
* This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 162 and 188. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 148 and 163. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 26 and 44.
Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Seville, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Chandler Heights, Firebird Lake, Sacaton, Santan, Mobile, Stanfield, and Ak-Chin Village.
info.instruction: Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
